changes: Launched the website with a basic list of zodiac signs.
Integrated the horoscope API to display daily readings.
Successfully deployed the app on Vercel.
Uploaded the source code to GitHub as an open-source project.
bugFixes: Fixed an issue where the dark mode toggle did not apply changes instantly.
Introduced a card-based UI with hover effects, responsive grid layout, and animations for a smoother user experience.

changes: Added a dark mode toggle for improved accessibility.
bugFixes: Corrected UI alignment issues on smaller screens.
Optimized API response handling for faster performance.

changes: Enhanced horoscope data fetching for better efficiency.
Improved UI styling to provide a more refined user experience.
Added animations to the loading screen and optimized responsiveness for the horoscope page.
bugFixes: Resolved recurring dark mode toggle issues.
Further refined card styling, hover effects, responsive grid, and animation on load.
Removed the plain text that says Loading... in the page and implemented CSS to beautify it.

changes: Implemented fine-tuning for sentiment analysis, ensuring that users no longer receive overly negative sentiment outputs for their horoscope.
Refined logic to modify negative sentiment results to something more positive or encouraging.
Adjusted sentiment output to display more positive or neutral sentiments, preventing overly harsh tones in user horoscope readings.
bugFixes: Added support for page reloads without encountering 404 errors.
React Router now correctly handles routes when refreshing specific horoscope pages, such as libra, ensuring users are redirected to the correct content.
Fixed page not found error during reload by ensuring that all routes are properly mapped to the index.html file on Vercel.

changes: Added images for each zodiac sign on the homepage, dynamically loaded based on the zodiac sign name (e.g., aries.png, taurus.png).
Integrated zodiac sign images alongside the zodiac titles, improving visual appeal on the front page.
Implemented responsive design for zodiac sign cards, ensuring they scale well across different screen sizes.
Introduced a hover effect with smooth scaling for the zodiac sign cards, enhancing interactivity.
Updated the design to support both light and dark modes, with zodiac card backgrounds and text colors adapting accordingly.
bugFixes: Fixed navbar layout issues on larger screens, ensuring the buttons stay compact and centered.
Resolved button stretching issues, which occurred when the page was viewed on wider laptop screens.
